skills.title: Frontend Development
skills.description: Skilled in front-end development using React, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and Tailwind CSS to create intuitive, responsive, dynamic, and accessible user interfaces

skills.title: Backend Development
skills.description: Expert in Node.js and Express.js, specializing in building robust, scalable server-side applications and RESTful APIs for seamless data management and integration

skills.title: Database Management
skills.description: Skilled in MongoDB and MySQL database management, specializing in designing, implementing, and optimizing databases for efficient and reliable data storage and retrieval.

portfolio.title: IMDB Clone
portfolio.description: I crafted IMDb-Clone, employing HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. Integrated TMDB API for dynamic movie data, utilized React for state management, and crafted a responsive, user-friendly interface.

portfolio.title: CodeShare
portfolio.description: I brought Realtime-CodeShare to life. Using Node.js and Socket.io for smooth communication, I hosted servers with Express.js. The React library added a touch of magic to create attractive interfaces.

portfolio.title: BookWiseHub
portfolio.description: BookWiseHub is like a digital library where we keep track of all kinds of books. This full-stack app is built using React, Tailwind CSS, Express.js, Node.js, and MongoDB, providing seamless user experience.
